definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
Tom Thumb (small person in folk tales)
Tom Thumb (small person in folk tales)
to give a thumbs-up/to express one's approval

sentences.english: They might suck their thumb, seek out a blanket or so on.
sentences.chinese: 吮大拇指，或是去寻找毯子之类的。

sentences.english: Our opposable thumbs, as we call them, allow us to work with our fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我们的对生拇指，使得我们可以使用手指工作。

sentences.english: Oliver wet his great thumb briefly.
sentences.chinese: 奥立佛凝神舐了一舐大拇指。

sentences.english: Their thumbs sure must be sore.
The picture on the right shows its size against a thumb.
sentences.chinese: 右边图片将它的大小和一个拇指进行了对比。

sentences.english: Bad music Anita, frequency Alice thumb.
sentences.chinese: 乐坏阿尼塔，频翘大拇指。

sentences.english: Malocclusion can be related to habits such as thumb sucking or premature loss of the deciduous (milk, baby) teeth.
sentences.chinese: 错颌畸形与一些习惯如允吸大拇指乳牙过早脱落有关。

sentences.english: Use the thumbs and forefingers to guide the floss between the teeth.
sentences.chinese: 握紧牙线，用食指和拇指轻柔地在牙缝间操作牙线。

sentences.english: Press your thumb to the muscle from the top of haunch outside with the same method as above.
sentences.chinese: 用同样的手法，从臀部顶向外侧把拇指压进肌肉。

sentences.english: And I have got swimmers that do swim with their thumbs out.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个弟子，游泳时还真的把拇指向外伸。

sentences.english: The driver grinned and gave me a thumbs-up sign.
sentences.chinese: 汽车司机会意地咧嘴一笑，向我竖起大拇指。

sentences.english: My two hands met as if in prayer, as the thick thumbs took center stage.
sentences.chinese: 我两双手合在一起像是祈祷，厚厚的拇指在键盘中央。

sentences.english: There should be a thumb’s width between the tip of your big toe and the top of the shoe.
sentences.chinese: 在你的大母脚趾尖与鞋头间应当有一拇指宽的空隙。

sentences.english: Apes and monkeys also have opposable thumbs on their feet that help their dexterity.
sentences.chinese: 类人猿和猴子脚部也有增加其灵敏性的对生拇指。

sentences.english: Hold the fingers straight and then close them against the thumb.
sentences.chinese: 将四只手指竖直并拢并向大拇指方向闭合即可。

sentences.english: Opening and closing of these three knives is accomplished by a thumb stud.
sentences.chinese: 开合这三把刀可以用拇指柱来完成。

definition: Tom Thumb (small person in folk tales)
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
